meanings.definition: A game of chance in which each player matches numbers on their card with numbers drawn by a caller.
meanings.sent1: During the bingos game, everyone eagerly waits to see if their numbers match the ones called.
meanings.sent2: My grandma loves playing bingos at the community center every Friday night.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the bingos game got so intense that even the quietest relatives started cheering.
meanings.sent4: The bingos of fate aligned perfectly, leading to an unexpected win for the underdog player.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bingos cards filled the room with excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: A call made by a player who completes a row, column, or diagonal on their card in the game of bingo.
meanings.sent1: With a loud bingos, Sarah signaled that she had completed a full row on her card.
meanings.sent2: The winning bingos echoed through the hall, declaring a victorious player.
meanings.sent3: As soon as the final bingos was called, the room erupted in cheers and applause.
meanings.sent4: The bingos of triumph rang out, marking the end of an intense round of bingo.
meanings.sent5: The decisive bingos announced the winner, bringing an end to the suspenseful game.

meanings.definition: Used to express excitement or satisfaction when achieving a goal or success.
meanings.sent1: Bingos! I finally finished my project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: After acing the test, she exclaimed, 'Bingos!' with a big smile.
meanings.sent3: When the team won the championship, the coach shouted 'Bingos!' in celebration.
meanings.sent4: Bingos! The surprise party was a huge success, much to everyone's delight.
meanings.sent5: With a loud 'Bingos!', he completed the final piece of the puzzle and jumped with joy.
